About

Stevo started the bettercast in 2017 as an excuse to have conversations about what it means to “get better at things.”

Season One featured conversations that all began with the questions:

  1. What’s something that you have recently gotten better at?
  2. How did you get better at it?

Who’s Stevo?

Steven M. Ledbetter is a behavior change nerd who lives in Emeryville, CA. He co-founded his company Habitry in 2014 with the mission to, “help the most people help the most people.”
